title: Service Delivery
description: Service delivery refers to the process of providing services to customers or clients in a way that meets their expectations and needs.

title: Capacity Building
description: Capacity building about a foundation refers to the process of strengthening the skills, knowledge, resources, and abilities.

title: Humanitarian Assistance
description: Humanitarian assistance for a foundation involves providing support and resources to help individuals or communities affected by crises.

title: Community Engagement
description: Community engagement for a foundation refers to the process of building strong relationships with local communities.

title: Sustainable Development
description: Promoting sustainable development requires coordinated efforts from governments, businesses, civil society, and individuals.
